EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA.
DNC 08, DNC 09.
VESSEL, NUMEROUS PERSONS ON BOARD, REQUESTING
ASSISTANCE BETWEEN ZUWARAH (32-56N 012-05E) AND
34-00N 013-00E AT 312300Z DEC. VESSELS IN
VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,

FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
